source.9219f0b7:
def ecdf(data):
    x=np.sort(data)
    y=np.arange(1,len(data)+1)/len(data)
    return x,y
source.65c052bb:
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
x,y=ecdf([1,2,3,4,5])
plt.plot(x,y)
plt.show()
